Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; faded added white outline of lotus flower with some added red; on right, part of floral pattern in faded white; top of rim glazed; exterior: at rim, dot band between bands; below, painted decoration consisting of female figure (part of head remaining) to right; at far right, group of short vertical strokes (filling ornament or hand?); all fired reddish.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 286, no. 832)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1008) (phase 2)
